question: India has finalised a Deal with which country for manufacturing AK-47 203 rifles in India?
explanation:
During the Defence Minister Rajnath Singh's visit in Moscow, India and Russia have finalised a major deal for manufacturing AK-47 203 rifles in India.
The rifles will be manufactured in India as part of the joint venture Indo-Russia Rifles Private Limited (IRRPL). The AK-47 203 is the advanced version of the AK-47 rifle and will replace the INSAS assault rifle.
